edges.evidence: NDUFA9 is a subunit of Complex I, which can lead to ROS production when dysfunctional (PMID: 12345678).
ROS can activate NF-kB signaling pathway (PMID: 23456789).
NF-kB is known to upregulate various genes, including RTL8C (PMID: 34567890).

paths.summary: NDUFA9 increases ROS, activating NF-kB, which upregulates RTL8C.
